title: Classification of Heart Disease
description: Built a CNN-RNN-LSTM model to predict heart disease from medical data.

title: Breast Cancer Classification
description: Implemented an LSTM-CNN-RNN model for breast cancer classification from imaging data.

title: Multiple Face Detection using OpenCV
description: Built an OpenCV-based face detection system for real-time face identification

title: DataFit (Final Year Project)
description: Leveraged pre-built functions to preprocess data, addressing missing values, categorical/text data, and normalization/standardization. Utilized feature engineering tools to extract, transform, and select relevant features, boosting model accuracy. Employed built-in algorithms to identify and balance imbalanced datasets, ensuring robust model training.
